title: MahJong Suite 2008
description:
Enter Hi-Scores and manage your Statistics. Play to reach the Hi-Score for every layout and manage games won, with 3D Graphics.
 	

Create an unlimited number of Players so that you can challenge your friends to beat one another&#039;s Hi-Scores, Games won, Score Statistics.

MahJong Suite 2008 features a lot of options such as: "Show a legal move" command;  Complete Statistics with 3D Graphics; Layout Manager; Customize Tile Sets and Backgrounds; unlimited levels of the undo/redo; ability to save, load and restart games; high-quality on-line help; select a game number; select your favorite games; associate sound effects and much more!

System Requirements:

      One of the following operating systems: Microsoft Windows 98/Me/NT/2000/XP/Vista (all editions).
    *

      64 megabytes (MB) of RAM (128 MB or more recommended).
    *

      640 x 480 screen resolution (800 x 600 or higher recommended).
    *

      HiColor 16 bit display adapter or higher
